## Ideas for Personal Chatbot

- Use LangChain agent with custom toolset: RAG retriever, calculator, search wrapper
- Implement system memory using Redis or JSON-based long-term storage
- Use NVIDIA's `mixtral-8x7b-instruct` via proxy in client_server.py
- Break down documents into small markdown sections and enrich with metadata
- Add feedback logging for failed queries or hallucinations

## Retrieval Strategy Notes

- Combine vector + keyword retrieval (hybrid)
- Chunk at paragraph-level with title + heading for anchors
- Add personal tags: `goal`, `project`, `education`, `faq`, `qa`, `experience`, `task`
- Leverage time metadata for recency-based prioritization

## Model Setup

- Embed with `bge-m3` (or `text-embedding-3-large`)
- Route to OpenAI or NVIDIA NIMs based on availability
- Multi-agent flow: retrieval ‚Üí synthesis ‚Üí validator (future plan)
